Summary: bright greenish fire ball falling from sky
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around April 30th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMe my husband and my daughter wer driving home on old 231 heading toward mccution high school in lafayette indiana and we were about to make a left turn into our neighborhood when all of a sudden we both saw to or right way up in the sky a a veryyyy bright greenish glowing ball falling towards the eath. As it was happening both me and my husband just kept saying OMG!OMG! It scared both of us very bad but was also exciting.Instead on stoping and turning at our road to our neighborhood we decided to keep going down the road to see if we could see it again because it had went behind the treeline. We drove up the road to a clear spot and stoped on the side of the road to see if it would show up again.It never showed up again though.WE ended up going bach home and the whole rest of the night I kept getting goosebumps.This happened at exactly 11:30pm.
